text: I've implemented layouts for Plan Chooser, This Week's Workouts, and Free Run. Israel is doing the Tips animation. That leaves the Main Menu, Active Workout, and Workout Summary designs not yet implemented in the app.
that's some impressive progress for a week!

I was thinking of sending an email to Israel to see what he thinks, but the areas that aren't yet implemented are pretty big, and my understanding is that the app needs more functionality to be able to view/test those screens
So I'm not sure if starting on those other areas should be part of the plan for this afternoon/tomorrow, or if it makes sense to wrap it up as it currently looks

i think it's worth reaching out to israel so he knows what has been accomplished. i agree though, it sounds like it doesn't make a ton of sense to scratch the surface on those other areas given the time remaining but maybe he has an idea of a smaller task that still needs to be done. thoughts?
it might make sense to do the main menu designs, I can get that done this afternoon
that sounds like a good plan
